npc.name: a Demon Princess
npc.description: You stare in awe at her beauty.
npc.speaker: false
npc.question_3: 3. Can you give me some rare items?
npc.question_4: 4. Did you bring me a Dead Stone?
npc.response_1: Demon Princess: You shall not learn my name so easily peasant.
npc.response_2: Demon Princess: Thanks! They're purely for the aesthetic.
npc.response_3: Demon Princess grins and stares at you.. you feel uneasy.
npc.response_4: Demon Princess gleefully takes the Dead Stone and gives you a Green Scroll!

npc.name: Bartender
npc.description: The bartender impatiently awaits your order.
npc.speaker: false

npc.name: James' Weapon Emporium
npc.description: Prepare for trouble, with our selection of weapons!
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: James: Visit James' Weapon Emporium for the BEST weapons!
npc.speaker_phrase_2: James: Hey kid, want to buy a pointy piece of metal?
npc.speaker_phrase_3: James: Don't let those swamp creatures get ya, buy some armor.

npc.name: Herb
npc.description: Welcome to Herb's Herbs! We've got the finest herbs in the land.
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: Herb: Do you find yourself getting tired? An Herb will perk you right up!
npc.speaker_phrase_2: Herb: Everything here is medicinal, I swear!
npc.speaker_phrase_3: Herb: Pass the dutchie to the left hand side.
npc.speaker_phrase_4: Herb: If you want to earn some gold, find me some Green Tonic.

npc.name: Swamp Hag
npc.description: You stare in awe at her beauty.
npc.speaker: false
npc.question_2: 2. You look like you're missing something!
npc.response_1: Swamp Hag: I am the Swamp Hag. I live here.
npc.response_2: Swamp Hag: Someone stole my Dead Stone. It's my magical rock that protects me from the creatures that inhabit this swamp. Without it I'm completely powerless!!
npc.response_4: Swamp Hag: Thank you so much! Have this green scroll!

npc.name: Michael the Guide
npc.description: You stand in front a man with stunning calves offering advice.
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: Michael the Guide: Hey there, come over here and press 'L', let's chat!
npc.speaker_phrase_2: Michael the Guide: If you have any questions, let me know!
npc.speaker_phrase_3: Michael the Guide waves you over to him.
npc.speaker_phrase_4: Michael the Guide: Want a hug?
npc.question_3: 3. Do you have a quest for me?
npc.question_4: 4. I found a book for you!
npc.response_1: Michael the Guide: I'm Michael! Nice to meet you! I'm here to provide guidance to new adventurers in the realm of DragonSpires.
npc.response_2: Michael the Guide: There is a swamp to the west with a few dangerous creatures. There's also rumor of that the hag in the swamp has a magical scroll! Following the path north, then west leads to the old castle.. last I heard it's pretty dangerous.
npc.response_3: Michael the Guide: I DO have a quest for you! I enjoy a good book, would you mind bringing me one? The Inn Keeper usually stocks a few in his rooms.
npc.response_4: Michael the Guide smiles wide and takes the book, giving you a Heavy Sword to keep you safe on your adventures in DragonSpires!

npc.name: Andy
npc.description: You see Andy, the owner of Andy's Amazing Aquarium.
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: Andy: I invented this suit this morning! I call it Stupa Gear!
npc.speaker_phrase_2: Andy: Fish are so much better and nicer than people..
npc.speaker_phrase_4: Andy: .... AIR! AIR! *gasp!* ... air..... Puuhh!... Oh.. was standing on the hose again..
npc.question_2: 2. What are you doing in there
npc.question_3: 3. What kinds of animals you have?
npc.question_4: 4. I found a Blue Crab for your collection!
npc.response_1: Andy: I'm Andy, of Andy's Amazing Aquarium!
npc.response_2: Andy: I invented a way to breathe under water. The only problem is I can't lift this heavy suit to get out.
npc.response_3: Andy: Just about everything. I also collect Blue Crabs, people seem to leave them out to dry an awful lot. It's a real shame.
npc.response_4: Andy: Oh, this crab is just clinging to life!! I will nurse him back to health! Thank you, please take this Hermit Crab, they breath air, so it will make you a lovely pet.

npc.name: Succubus
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: Succubus: Contrary to popular belief, being a Succubus *doesn't* suck.

npc.name: Alchemist
npc.description: You see a (kind of) evil Alchemist.
npc.speaker: true
npc.speaker_phrase_1: Alchemist: I invoke the mystical forces of evil to cure my acne!
npc.speaker_phrase_2: Alchemist: I curse this land with eternal darkness!... after the parade..
npc.speaker_phrase_3: Alchemist: Damn, I need some silver coins.
npc.question_1: 1. You look troubled, what's the matter?
npc.question_2: 2. Can I have that large stone over there?
npc.question_4: 4. Would you like Large Fish? It's very stinky!
npc.response_1: Alchemist: Woman troubles. I want to cast a love spell on Succubus, but I don't have enough stinky fish for the potion to work. I need five, but I only have four.
npc.response_2: Alchemist: Well.. I suppose I could part with it if you could get me 10 stinky fish. I really need them! *twitch*
npc.response_4: Alchemist: Oh. Yes. You have the fish! Here, take the stone.
